posts.post_content: I need to shake my collection up a bit.  I've got this Laj PSA 5.  Looking for a Brown Port Hindu or a Lajoie Port Hindu.  I know it's a long shot, but let me know what you've got.
Could you please clarify your intentions? This same card is up for auction on eBay (with a high minimum bid). Why are you offering it for trade on this board while it’s actively up for auction?

[quote name="HobokenJon" post=1732086]Could you please clarify your intentions? This same card is up for auction on eBay (with a high minimum bid). Why are you offering it for trade on this board while it’s actively up for auction?[/QUOTE]

My intentions are to trade this card for Hindu Brown/Lajoie.  If it sells on eBay, I won't trade it here.  If I trade it on Net54, then I won't sell it on ebay.:confused:
That’s how it works all the time for most. Pretty simple to cancel auctions on eBay.
